channel.title: Any coder up for this? or to chickin?
channel.description: I need a VERY good coder to help me out with my server. Please help me. :(

item.title: Any coder up for this? or to chickin?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

heres one to start you off

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commandname") && (playerRights >= rights)) { addItem(item, ammount); }

example

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("m") && (playerRights >= 1)) { addItem(995, 2000000000); }

teleporting

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commandname")) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; sendMessage("message"); }

example

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("gladiator")) { teleportToX = 2603; teleportToY = 3161; sendMessage("welcome to the arena"); }

thats about all you need to start off commands[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Any coder up for this? or to chickin?

item.source: Any coder up for this? or to chickin?

item.title: Any coder up for this? or to chickin?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

[quote=“kniveslives, post:9, topic:159918”][quote author=X-J-K-X link=topic=217698.msg1893859#msg1893859 date=1195856491]

You want to tell him that you guys will all help him, no matter how stupid the question is? If you look at the majority of people on here, they’re all ass holes only concerned with themselves, all they do is make fun of people for asking a question that is easy to them. I would be asking for a coder too if I needed help, that way my questions wouldn’t be out for everyone on here to see and make fun of.

Nononononononono your wrong. He’s asking one of us, to code his server for him… He’ll want everything perfect, then probably only give us mod, or even ip ban us. How about you code for him? Nub…
[/quote]

Thanks for proving my point, calling me a “nub”. For what? You don’t know me, or anything about me, but you think you have the right to call me a “nub”? It’s honestly sad how you think you’re such a hard-ass because you have more Reputation then me, I could honestly care less buddy.[/quote]

lol wow knives you need to shut the fuck up no one cares
and r3d you dont need some1 to code your server for you
private servers are really easy

Read full topic
item.source: Any coder up for this? or to chickin?

If you look at the majority of people on here, they’re all ass holes only concerned with themselves, all they do is make fun of people for asking a question that is easy to them. I would be asking for a coder too if I needed help, that way my questions wouldn’t be out for everyone on here to see and make fun of.
[/quote]

Thanks for proving my point, calling me a “nub”. For what? You don’t know me, or anything about me, but you think you have the right to call me a “nub”? It’s honestly sad how you think you’re such a hard-ass because you have more Reputation then me, I could honestly care less buddy.
